title: Lag as of 5pm EDT
body: Been getting pings between 150-200ms as of 5pm EDT.  Won't go under 150ms.  Not my internet, all other site are running fine.  Any idea?

replies.body:
I ran the Hextech Repair tool and my problem was resolved.  I also forced a Patch.   Back to 30-40ms ping.  Must have been a corrupted file during the last patch.

Thanks for replying, I was beginning to think you guys didn't care :P

Latency hikes during certain hours are most often a result of ISP routing changes to the specific server you're accessing. We can take a look at your route during the affected periods of time, but first, we need to ensure your local settings are good to go. To do this, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as local network settings can exacerbate latency issues.

Let me know if your latency issue persists.
Don't know but it's on their side. Ran a bot match, my fiancee is running 48ms while I have 90ms and having issues reconnecting while we're on the same connection.
